intro: Stemona shandongensis, commonly known as the Shandong stemona, is a perennial herb native to China. It belongs to the family Loganiaceae and is characterized by its slender, cylindrical stems that are often branched. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in mountainous regions. The roots of Stemona shandongensis are valued in traditional medicine for their purported health benefits.
